Mauling Bear.name: Mauling Bear
Mauling Bear.fullText:
Bear Warrior Attack 11Mauling Bear

You channel the bear’s strength into a powerful blow that knocks your opponent to the ground. Like an angry bear, you stand over your foe, waiting for its next move.

Encounter        Primal, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, if you are adjacent to the target when it stands up, you can make a melee basic attack against it as an immediate reaction.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 62.
Mauling Bear.flavor: You channel the bear’s strength into a powerful blow that knocks your opponent to the ground. Like an angry bear, you stand over your foe, waiting for its next move.
Mauling Bear.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Mauling Bear.effect: Until the end of your next turn, if you are adjacent to the target when it stands up, you can make a melee basic attack against it as an immediate reaction.

Bestial Vigor.name: Bestial Vigor
Bestial Vigor.fullText:
Bear Warrior Utility 12Bestial Vigor

Primal might wells within you, allowing you to shake off wounds and see the fight to its end.

Daily        Primal
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value and can make a saving throw against each effect on you that a save can end.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 62.
Bestial Vigor.flavor: Primal might wells within you, allowing you to shake off wounds and see the fight to its end.
Bestial Vigor.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value and can make a saving throw against each effect on you that a save can end.

Rampaging Bear.name: Rampaging Bear
Rampaging Bear.fullText:
Bear Warrior Attack 20Rampaging Bear

With a mighty roar, you crash through the battle lines of your enemies.

Daily        Primal, Rage, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Primary Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square and knock it prone.

Effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier and then make a secondary attack.

  Secondary Target: One creature other than the primary target

  Secondary Attack: Strength vs. AC

  Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the secondary target 1 square and knock it prone.

Effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier. You then enter the bear warrior’s rage. Until the rage ends, you gain regeneration 5, and whenever you are pulled, pushed, or slid, you can reduce the distance of the forced movement by 1 square.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 62.
Rampaging Bear.flavor: With a mighty roar, you crash through the battle lines of your enemies.
Rampaging Bear.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square and knock it prone.
Rampaging Bear.effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier and then make a secondary attack.
Rampaging Bear.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Rampaging Bear.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the secondary target 1 square and knock it prone.
Rampaging Bear.secondaryeffect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier. You then enter the bear warrior’s rage. Until the rage ends, you gain regeneration 5, and whenever you are pulled, pushed, or slid, you can reduce the distance of the forced movement by 1 square.
